definition: of grammatical gender, a gender that refers chiefly (but not exclusively) to females or to objects classified as female
details:
adjective
- of grammatical gender
= synonyms: masculine
- (music or poetry) ending on an unaccented beat or syllable
= example: (music or poetry) ending on an unaccented beat or syllable
- associated with women and not with men
= example: associated with women and not with men
- befitting or characteristic of a woman especially a mature woman
= synonyms: womanly
noun
- a gender that refers chiefly (but not exclusively) to females or to objects classified as female
